content.description:
Librum tuum legi et, quam diligentissime potui, 
annotaviannoto, -are, -avi: to note quae mutanda putarem.
content.question: In the sentence, how is quam diligentissime potui translated?

choices.label: I could be more careful than

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius
